title: German Catholic Leaders Support Blessings for Gay Couples, Challenging Pope Francis
sub_head: Vote comes despite Vatican ban in March, amid worries that unilateral moves could split the church
body:
German Catholic bishops and lay leaders on Friday called for their church to bless same-sex relationships, challenging a Vatican ban on the practice.
The move raised pressure on Pope Francis to respond to the Germansâ€™ progressive drive, which conservatives have warned could split the world-wide church.
